definition: to work as a carter or porter/to transport goods for a living (esp. by donkey)
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: After writing Read it aloud. This is the best proof reading method that is proven.
sentences.chinese: 寫完了讀一讀，趕腳哪裏不順的再改改。

sentences.english: They both give you a nice warm feeling without making any sound.
sentences.chinese: 因爲它們在不出聲時給你溫暖的趕腳。
